column2: Role   and   Responsibilities- ??Work closely with Strategy head towards building the overall business strategy for the retail broking business including components such as overall business P&L management, products innovations, efficiency building across team through effective use of data. ??Competition study across domestic and international markets and thoughts around organizations positioning versus competition, identify new business opportunities across products, initiatives, new business lines etc which are well support with data. ??Study the external competitive environment in-depth and in a routine manner with actionable insights on things happening domestically and in international financial markets providing learning and ideas for the organization to implement. ??Analysing and providing valuable benchmarking for business heads & management as well as timely insights to various departments. Analysing long-term market trends for the purpose of providing recommendations to leadership and management across the business regarding business development opportunities ??Work towards the development of the business KPI along with meaningful insights to facilitate analysis and reporting of performance against plans and budgets as well as strategic objectives across routine business activities, product performances etc. ??Develop and manage daily/weekly/quarterly/annual performance reports for the business leaders as well as facilitating cross-functional performance reviews for this leadership. ??Manage the development of corporate plans and budgets by playing a lead role in all the planning and budgeting activities performed by the business. ??Review key strategic priorities and translates them into actionable and quantitative plans along with the Strategy head. ??Identify critical requirements & potential gaps by understanding complex and interdependent processes and suggest/implement solutions. Qualifications   and   Education   Requirements ??Graduate/Postgraduate in any stream with above required skills. Work   Experience ??Should have at least 7 years of work experience into Stock Broking. ??Should be well versed with the market research of the competitors and accordingly devise a strategy to drive the business growth. Preferred   Skills ??Strategic Perspective, Result Orientation, Leadership, Project Management, Analytical skills ??Excel/PowerPoint/Word & SQL/Power Query/Tableau/PowerBI will be added advantage.
column11: Business Strategy, Business Intelligence, Analytical Skills, Strategic Business Planning, Project Management, Corporate Strategy, Leadership, Power Bi, KPI, Strategy Making, Strategy Implementation, Business Planning, Strategy Formulation, Corporate Plan, Growth Strategy

column2: The Industry Strategist Join our team in Strategy consulting for an exciting career opportunity to work on the CEO agenda of our most strategic clients across the globe Practice: Strategy  C onsulting,  Global  Network  (GN) Areas of Work: Process Consulting; Cost Transformation; Operating Model; Go To Market, Target Operating Models Change, Mergers & Acquisitions; Sustainability & Responsible Business; Digitization, Cloud Transformation, Data and AI strategy,  Operations /Risk /Regulatory/Payments innovation Level: Senior Manager  Location: Gurgaon, Mumbai & Bangalore  Years of Exp: 11+ years post MBA  Explore an Exciting Career at Accenture Do you believe in creating an impact? Are you a problem solver who enjoys working on transformative strategies for global clients? Are you passionate about being part of an inclusive, diverse, and collaborative culture?  Then, this is the right place for you! Welcome to a host of exciting global opportunities in Accenture Strategy and Consulting. The Practice- A Brief Sketch: The  Global Network (GN) Strategy Practice  is a part of  and focuses on the CEO's most strategic priorities. We help clients with strategies that are at the intersection of business and technology, drive value and impact, shape new businesses & design operating models for the future. We provide you with a great learning ground, deep-rooted in  ,  where you will get an opportunity to advice and work with our key global  Capital Markets  clients , driving end-to-end transformative strategic value and business growth. As a part of this high performing team, these are some of the  responsibilities : Analyze markets, consumers, economies, and conduct feasibility studies  to  uncover  trends and opportunities in the  Capital Markets industry Work with  Capital Markets clients  around the globe  to identify their strategic goals and develop comprehensive plans to achieve the m Develop  and execute  strategies  to address challenges including  cost optimization, revenue growth, redefining customer experience  and technological advancements Partner with CEOs to architect future proof  operating models  embracing future of work, workforce and workplace powered by transformational technology, ecosystems ,  and analytics Work with our ecosystem partners, help clients reach their  sustainability goals  through digital transformation Prepare and deliver presentations to  senior client leadership (CXOs, Business Heads)  to communicate strategic plans and recommendations Support clients in their  inorganic growth agenda across the deal lifecycle, i.e., target screening, synergy assessment, due diligence, post-merger integration and portfolio interventions.  Serve as a strategic partner to clients by enabling them to make effective business decisions via regular updates on  industry trends ,  potential opportunities and threats Participate in the development of thought leadership content, including white papers and presentations, on  key themes/hot topics pertaining to the  Capital Markets industry Bring your best skills forward to excel in the role: The ideal candidate will possess a  strong  understanding of the  Capital Markets industry, including emerging trends, challenges, and opportunities. They will have a proven track record of developing and executing successful strategies for  Capital Markets  companies. The candidate will work with our clients to identify their strategic goals and develop comprehensive plans to achieve them.  Key skills that will enable this include: A  Strategic Mindset  to shape  innovative, fact-based strategies and operating models Issue Based Problem Solving  to decode and solve complex and unstructured business questions Business Acumen  to drive actionable outcomes for clients with the latest industry trends, innovations and disruptions, metrics and value drivers An excellent, established track record for  selling and delivering consulting engagements .  Experience  working with C level  executive clients, with extensive experience in projects in which the primary stakeholder was the  C-suite Strategy consulting experience in Corporate Strategy/Restructuring;  G TM  Strategy, Market Entry Strategy, Operating Model Strategy,  Process Transformation & Maturity Assessment , value and investment case design, Strategic Cost Reduction, Digit ization , M&A , GTM sales Industry Knowledge: In-depth understanding of one or more sub-sectors of the  Capital Markets  Industry ( Asset, Wealth, IB, Market Infrastructure ), and good business understanding of the  Capital Markets  value chain  Demonstrated capability to generate strategy sales and demand with market unit leads Enable and grow strategy capability with practitioners through upskilling agenda, key metrics management and develop next generation leaders Qualification Your experience counts! MBA degree from a recognized institution. Prior experience in the  Capital Markets  Industry/Consulting with  Capital Markets  clients At least 11 years of post-MBA experience in a wealth management firm, with a focus on wealth management platform implementation. Proficiency in wealth management platforms such as Avaloq, Broadridge, W360, Multifonds, Triple A plus,  SEI Wealth, InvestCloud  etc. Familiarity with the features, functionalities, and best practices of these platforms is essential. Extensive experience working on data management projects, including data strategy, data governance, data controls, and data lineage specifically in the area of wealth management. Knowledge about the evolving landscape of robo-advisory technologies, including algorithmic trading, portfolio optimization algorithms, and client-facing digital interfaces. Utilize this knowledge to advise on the implementation and integration of robo-advisory features within wealth management platforms to enhance client offerings and operational efficiency. Strong project management skills with the ability to lead and manage complex wealth management platform implementation projects from initiation to completion. Proven ability to effectively engage and manage relationships with internal stakeholders, external vendors, and clients throughout the implementation process. Understanding of regulatory requirements and compliance standards related to wealth management platforms and data management in the financial services industry. Stay abreast of the latest technologies, trends, and innovations in the wealth management space. This includes advancements in fintech solutions, artificial intelligence, machine learning, blockchain, and data analytics relevant to wealth management platform implementation. What's in it for you? An opportunity to work on

column2: Reporting directly to the Chief Executive Officer (CEO), this role offers a unique opportunity to work closely with the CEO, contributing to the strategic decision-making process and playing a crucial role in the success of the organization. The Principal advisor serves as the primary point of contact for internal and external constituencies on all business matters pertaining to the CEO. The ideal individual will have the ability to exercise good judgment in a variety of situations, with strong written and verbal communication, administrative, and organizational skills, and the ability to maintain a realistic balance among multiple priorities. If you thrive in a dynamic environment, possess the required skills, and are ready to take on a challenging yet rewarding position, we encourage you to apply. Candidates with RELEVANT EXPERIENCE with boutique IBs, Rating Agencies, Banks, NBFCs, Asset Managers and ability to analyze financial statements are encouraged to apply.  What should you look forward to? The candidate will get the opportunity to work closely with the CEO, gaining valuable exposure to high-level decision-making and interaction with investors. This experience will significantly enhance their professional profile and expertise. KEY ACTIVITIES & RESPONSIBILITIES  Work with the team to ensure delivery of high fundraising solutions for clients. Work on a wide range of responsibilities from initial client pitches through till transaction closing.  With great attention to detail, understand the business of clients and work on the investment storyboard by preparation of information memorandum and financial model. Work on investor/lender reachouts, negotiation of term sheets, and other transaction documents.  Work with third-party agencies like lawyers, due diligence advisors, etc to arrive at an optimal fundraising structure. Business development by reaching potential clients across allocated sectors Individuals will be given wide ranging projects and responsibilities to ensure their growth professionally. Prepare Teaser, Pitch books, Information Memorandum, etc  Preparing and understanding of businesses and financial modeling  PROFILE REQUIRED  CA-Fresher/work experience of up to 8 years reporting to the Senior Management Technical proficiency in understanding financial statements is a must Strong financial modelling and in Microsoft Office (Outlook, Word, Excel, and Power Point, Teams) & Google workspace applications. Qualification  Any Post Graduate Degree Good oral and written communication skills Strong interpersonal skills and the ability to build relationships with stakeholders, including staff, board members & external partners. Strong organizational, project management and problem-solving skills with impeccable multi-tasking abilities
column11: Investor Relations, Fund Raising, Information Memorandum, teasor, Industry Research, Pitch Books, investment storyboard, Financial Modelling, teaser

column2: Role & responsibilities:  Strong analytical skills with the ability to collect, organize, analyse, and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracy. Strong problem-solving and critical-thinking abilities, with a proactive and solution-oriented mindset. Implement and monitor new initiatives that include the development of products & processes which results in business growth. Work closely with the cross functional departments like Credit, Operation, IT, Audit, Legal and Compliance for requirement elicitation and implementation of new initiatives. Responsible for tracking and monitoring the projects and ensuring the projects are completed within stipulated timelines. Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and prioritize tasks effectively to meet deadlines. Effectively measure the project performance - Identify the gaps and propose effective solutions. Gather field insights, regular product & process benchmarking with competition and strategy for product & process re-alignment.  Preferred candidate profile: Hands-on experience in using data and metrics to measure impact and determine improvement. Product and Process knowledge (MFI/BFSI/NBFC). Experience in making data-driven decisions, developing customer insights from data strong analytical & presentation skills. 2+ years of professional experience in analytics, business analysis or comparable consumer analytics position. Advanced working knowledge of data mining using SQL, Power BI, PowerPoint as well as MS Excel. Familiarity in visualizing tools like Power BI/Tableau. Experience defining requirements and using data and metrics to draw business insights. An ability to think quantitatively and qualitatively about operating process and outcomes. Strong communication and interpersonal skills with aptitude in building relationships with professionals of all organizational levels. Proven problem-solving skills, attention to details and exceptional organizational skills. Ability to deal with ambiguity and competing objectives in a fast-paced environment. Perks and benefits:  Up to 8 lacs CTC per annum

column2: Job Description:    Assisting the Strategic Initiatives team which works with the Founders office on a  day-to-day basis.  To be involved in the strategic product launches from its initial stage to the final  market go-live.  Stay abreast of regulatory updates and changes in the real estate and financial advisory  industry, including but not limited to laws, regulations, guidelines, and market trends.  Strategy and consulting: Advising and assisting with special strategic projects as well as ongoing strategic  thinking, goal-setting and delivery.  Own and drive strategy formulation & implementation including market /competitor  analysis business strategy, go-to-market, strategic positioning capability building,  business planning, due diligence, operational problem solving, product launches etc. Responsible for identifying, developing and driving business level strategies that  drives revenue growth. Taking active part in and influencing strategic organizational issues, personally  connecting with each team member to keep the team engaged and motivated and  ensuring that the team as a whole works as a high-performance organization. Drafting high-impact presentations, reports, and communications for internal and  external stakeholders.  Monitor key performance indicators and track progress against strategic objectives,  providing regular updates and insights  Customer / Partner Engagement: Taking charge of the various loose ends, map out various relationships and build a  cohesive plan on how to strategically leverage the external environment and ensuring  they are in sync with the vision and plan. Assisting the Strategic Initiatives team in managing key strategic alliances and  partnerships   Product & Project management:   Work independently on some on-demand problems for the org with little direction or  oversight ??Overseeing special projects, conducting relevant research, preparing reports, and  presentations in association with other teams, making sure the tasks are completed as  per the agreed timelines. Lead user-research for new product lines and features. Lead the problem-solving process and be the go-to fire-fighter on the team. This role requires very strong interpersonal skills to gel with a young, dynamic and  fast-paced team. Work closely with various functional teams on key pillars of the business - product,  sales, marketing and project management   Criteria  At least 2-4 years of work experience in product strategy, corporate strategy, or  management consulting.  CA / Bachelors Degree from a premier Institute.  MBA preferred from a Tier-I B School Superior problem-solving, bias for action and conceptual thinking skills. Outstanding senior management communication skills. Need to have really strong  oral, written and presentation skills including ability to communicate very complex  ideas in simple ways. Problem-solving: Ability to think through issues and come up with solutions in a fast  frugal manner.  Salary as per Industry standards

Practice:  Supply Chain and Operations, Industry Consulting, Capability Network I  Areas of Work: Business Strategy, Supply Chain Management - Fulfilment |  Level: Analyst / Consultant |  Location: Bengaluru, Gurugram, Mumbai |  Years of Exp: 2-8 years Supply chain and operations practice, you will help organizations reimagine and transform their supply chains for tomorrow-with a positive impact on the business, society and the planet. Together, let's innovate, build competitive advantage, improve business, and societal outcomes, in an ever-changing, ever-challenging world. Help us make supply chains work better, faster, and be more resilient, with the following initiatives: Develop and implement strategies, best practices , enabling strategic solutions, and change management programs to help manage Fulfilment function more efficiently. Assist with Logistics and Fulfilment strategy  to improve key performance metrics. Chart a strategic roadmap for clients  to achieve their goals backed by comprehensive assessment and a business value case. Drive qualitative and quantitative process assessments  to enable a clear lens on enterprise process performance and gaps. Help client in areas of organization structure, governance , process reengineering and solution strategy. Design, architect and manage strategic solution -led transformation for clients. Deliver expertise for the implementation and continuous improvement of Logistics strategy,  organization, network, processes, operations, and technology. Guide the team during the build and test phases  of the project. Demonstrate understanding of processes and best practices  to help an organization improve outcomes. Oversee operations  in areas that include transportation planning, route planning, warehouse layout design, equipment and automations, 3PL service evaluation and logistics trainings. Draft proposals , set up objectives and draw an action plan for prospective clients. Bring your best skills forward to excel in the role: Impeccable team management skills  with an ability to engage effectively with multiple stakeholders Ability to solve complex business problems  and deliver client delight Strong analytical and writing skills  to build viewpoints on industry trends Excellent communication, interpersonal and presentation skills  Cross-cultural competence  with an ability to thrive in a dynamic environment Read more about us. Your experience counts! MBA from Tier-1 B-school 2-8 years of relevant experience Must have worked on one or two projects in primary logistics such as strategic transportation sourcing, truck loading efficiency, truck-mix analysis, secondary logistics, distribution, warehousing, ocean and air freight and network optimization Exposure to any of these tools preferred:Llamasoft Supply Chain Guru, iLOG, SCS, SAP (TM, eWM, LE), Blue Yonder (TMS, Luminate, WMS), Oracle (TM) What's in it for you? An opportunity to work on with key G2000 clients Potential to with leaders in strategy, industry experts, enterprise function practitioners and, business intelligence professionals to shape and recommend innovative solutions that leverage emerging technologies. Ability to embed into everything-from how you service your clients to how you operate as a responsible professional. Personalized training modules to develop your to grow your skills, industry knowledge and capabilities Opportunity to thrive in a that is committed to accelerate equality for all. Engage in boundaryless collaboration across the entire organization.

column1: EA To Director For coordinating Sales, CRM & Marketing
column2: Roles & Responsibilities :-   As an Executive Assistant (EA) to a Director responsible for coordinating sales, CRM (Customer Relationship Management), and marketing in a real estate company, you will play a crucial role in supporting and facilitating these functions. Here's a general overview of your responsibilities: Sales Coordination: Prepare and organize documents, reports, and presentations. Assist in managing the sales team's schedules and appointments. Keep track of property listings, pricing, and availability. Support in organizing and promoting property viewings. Coordinate with the sales team to ensure client needs are met efficiently. CRM Management: Maintain and update the CRM system with client information and interactions. Help in segmenting and analyzing the client database for targeted marketing. Assist in developing and implementing CRM strategies to enhance customer satisfaction and retention. Marketing Support: Work with the marketing team to plan and execute marketing campaigns. Assist in creating marketing materials, such as brochures, websites, and social media content. Track and analyze the performance of marketing initiatives. Coordinate events and promotional activities. Data Management: Maintain databases of property listings, client information, and sales records. Ensure data accuracy and integrity in all CRM and sales-related systems. Client Communication: Communicate with clients, addressing inquiries and concerns. Send follow-up emails and surveys to gather feedback for continuous improvement. Project Coordination: Assist in special projects related to sales, CRM, and marketing. Collaborate with different departments to ensure projects are completed on time and within budget. Reporting: Prepare regular reports on sales performance, CRM metrics, and marketing results. Provide insights and recommendations based on data analysis. Your role as an EA in this context involves multi-tasking, excellent organizational skills, and strong communication abilities. You'll need to work closely with the Director, sales teams, CRM specialists, and marketing professionals to ensure that these three essential aspects of the real estate business run smoothly and efficiently. Qualifications: Any degree with relevant experience of minimum 5 years in similar roles. Min 5 years+ experience in sales team coordination Strong analytical skills and the ability to work with large sets of data. Salary :- Rs. 5 Lakhs to 9 lakhs CTC per annum
column11: Personal Assistance, MIS Reporting, Management Skills, EA, Interpersonal Skills, Time Management, Technical Skills, Coordination Skills, attentiont to detail, Organizing, Strategic Business Planning, Marketing, Presentation Skills, Sales, C suite support, crm process

column2: As a Healthcare Strategy Analyst, you will play a critical role in supporting the strategic planning and decision-making processes within Siemens Healthineers Development Center. You will be responsible for conducting in-depth analysis of healthcare trends, global market dynamics, competitive and technology landscapes to inform strategic initiatives. The role requires a strong analytical mindset, excellent communication skills, and a passion for healthcare innovation.         ?       Key Areas of Responsibilities:       ?     1.Conduct comprehensive research and analysis of healthcare market trends, emerging technologies, regulatory changes, and competitor strategies to identify new opportunities.     2.Monitor industry trends, competition including new entrants, analyze market positioning, and identify competitive advantages, risks for strategic decision-making.     3.Develop financial models and business potential estimates to assess the potential impact of strategic initiatives and to evaluate new business opportunities.     4.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to support development of strategic plans, set objectives, and establish key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure success.     5.Track and analyze performance metrics against strategic goals, identify areas for improvement, and make recommendations as required.     6.Translate complex data and analysis into clear and actionable insights through data visualization tools and presentations to senior leadership in the organization.     7.Stay abreast of industry developments, best practices, and innovative solutions (eg: AI, Gen AI, Quantum computing) in healthcare, and proactively recommend improvements and opportunities.         ?       Experience & Qualification requirements:       ?     1. Masters degree in business administration, healthcare administration, finance, economics, or related field     2. 3 to 5 years of experience in healthcare strategy, consulting, business analysis, or related role.     3. Strong analytical skills with proficiency in data analysis tools and techniques.     4. Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to present complex information in a clear and concise manner.     5. Strategic mindset with the ability to think critically, solve problems, and make data-driven decisions.     6. Proven ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet tight deadlines.     7. Experience working with healthcare data (eg: clinical, operational) and financial data is a plus.     8. Knowledge of healthcare industry dynamics, regulations.
column11: Analytical skills, Data analysis, Diagnostics, Business analysis, Finance, Strategic planning, Healthcare, data visualization, Operations, strategy analyst
